It's a scam! Very good.
Why is it a scam?
It can't exist because if you have n pieces of data, and your objective is to look at all of them, you can't do it in constant time.
For any constant time algorithm, there is an example of data size that will run longer than it.
You just increase the data size until it's bigger, it just can't happen.
The time it takes to print it out takes longer than that constant, what ever they say it is.
Do you all see that?
So that's a reasonable thing to think about every single time somebody tells you the running time of an algortihm.
